segment.source: End-to-End Operations Scenario for MED-V 2.0
segment.target: End-to-End Operations Scenario for MED-V 2.0

segment.source: End-to-End Operations Scenario for MED-V 2.0
segment.target: End-to-End Operations Scenario for MED-V 2.0

segment.source: End-to-End Operations Scenario for MED-V 2.0
segment.target: End-to-End Operations Scenario for MED-V 2.0

segment.source: This sample scenario for Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) 2.0 helps you deploy and manage MED-V by using multiple scenarios end-to-end.
segment.target: This sample scenario for Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) 2.0 helps you deploy and manage MED-V by using multiple scenarios end-to-end.

segment.source: You can think of this sample scenario as a case study that helps put the individual scenarios and procedures in context.
segment.target: You can think of this sample scenario as a case study that helps put the individual scenarios and procedures in context.

segment.source: This section provides basic information and directions for creating, deploying, and managing MED-V workspaces as an end-to-end solution in your enterprise.
segment.target: This section provides basic information and directions for creating, deploying, and managing MED-V workspaces as an end-to-end solution in your enterprise.

segment.source: MED-V Operations Step-by-step Scenario
segment.target: MED-V Operations Step-by-step Scenario

segment.source: The step-by-step procedures that you follow in a MED-V operations scenario include the following:
segment.target: The step-by-step procedures that you follow in a MED-V operations scenario include the following:

segment.source: Creating a Windows Virtual PC Image for MED-V reviews how to create and configure a Windows Virtual PC image for MED-V.
segment.target: Creating a Windows Virtual PC Image for MED-V reviews how to create and configure a Windows Virtual PC image for MED-V.

segment.source: Before you can deliver a MED-V workspace to users, you must first prepare a virtual hard disk (VHD) that you use to build the MED-V workspace installer package for MED-V.
segment.target: Before you can deliver a MED-V workspace to users, you must first prepare a virtual hard disk (VHD) that you use to build the MED-V workspace installer package for MED-V.

segment.source: Creating a Windows Virtual PC Image for MED-V reviews how to install the Windows XP SP3 operating system on your Windows Virtual PC image.
segment.target: Creating a Windows Virtual PC Image for MED-V reviews how to install the Windows XP SP3 operating system on your Windows Virtual PC image.

segment.source: MED-V requires that Windows XP SP3 is installed on the Windows Virtual PC image before you build the MED-V workspace.
segment.target: MED-V requires that Windows XP SP3 is installed on the Windows Virtual PC image before you build the MED-V workspace.

segment.source: Creating a Windows Virtual PC Image for MED-V reviews how to manually install the .NET Framework 3.5 SP1 and the update KB959209 into the Windows Virtual PC image that you prepare for use with MED-V.
segment.target: Creating a Windows Virtual PC Image for MED-V reviews how to manually install the .NET Framework 3.5 SP1 and the update KB959209 into the Windows Virtual PC image that you prepare for use with MED-V.

segment.source: MED-V requires the .NET Framework 3.5 SP1, and the update KB959209 (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=204950) addresses several known application compatibility issues.
segment.target: MED-V requires the .NET Framework 3.5 SP1, and the update KB959209 (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=204950) addresses several known application compatibility issues.

segment.source: Creating a Windows Virtual PC Image for MED-V reviews how to update your Windows XP image with the latest software updates and other hotfixes necessary or important for running MED-V.
segment.target: Creating a Windows Virtual PC Image for MED-V reviews how to update your Windows XP image with the latest software updates and other hotfixes necessary or important for running MED-V.

segment.source: Creating a Windows Virtual PC Image for MED-V reviews how to install the integration components package in your Windows XP image.
segment.target: Creating a Windows Virtual PC Image for MED-V reviews how to install the integration components package in your Windows XP image.

segment.source: These provide features that improve the interaction between the virtual environment and the physical computer.
segment.target: These provide features that improve the interaction between the virtual environment and the physical computer.

segment.source: Installing Applications on a Windows Virtual PC Image reviews how you can install certain kinds of software on your Windows XP image that are helpful when you are running MED-V, such as an electronic software distribution system and antivirus software.
segment.target: Installing Applications on a Windows Virtual PC Image reviews how you can install certain kinds of software on your Windows XP image that are helpful when you are running MED-V, such as an electronic software distribution system and antivirus software.

segment.source: Configuring a Windows Virtual PC Image for MED-V discusses how to configure the image by using Sysprep to make sure that it is ready for use with MED-V.
segment.target: Configuring a Windows Virtual PC Image for MED-V discusses how to configure the image by using Sysprep to make sure that it is ready for use with MED-V.

segment.source: The prepared MED-V image is then used to create your MED-V workspace package.
segment.target: The prepared MED-V image is then used to create your MED-V workspace package.

segment.source: Create a MED-V Workspace Package reviews how to build the MED-V workspace package that you deploy throughout your enterprise.
segment.target: Create a MED-V Workspace Package reviews how to build the MED-V workspace package that you deploy throughout your enterprise.

segment.source: You deploy the MED-V workspace package to install the MED-V workspace on end-user computers.
segment.target: You deploy the MED-V workspace package to install the MED-V workspace on end-user computers.

segment.source: A MED-V workspace is the Windows XP desktop environment from which end users interact with the virtual machine provided by MED-V.
segment.target: A MED-V workspace is the Windows XP desktop environment from which end users interact with the virtual machine provided by MED-V.

segment.source: Testing the MED-V Workspace Package discusses how to create a test environment in which you can test the functionality of the MED-V workspace package, such as first time setup settings and application publishing.
segment.target: Testing the MED-V Workspace Package discusses how to create a test environment in which you can test the functionality of the MED-V workspace package, such as first time setup settings and application publishing.

segment.source: After you have completed testing your MED-V workspace package and have verified that it is functioning as intended, you can deploy it throughout your enterprise.
segment.target: After you have completed testing your MED-V workspace package and have verified that it is functioning as intended, you can deploy it throughout your enterprise.

segment.source: Deploying the MED-V Workspace Package discusses how to deploy the MED-V workspace either by using an electronic software distribution system or in a Windows 7 image.
segment.target: Deploying the MED-V Workspace Package discusses how to deploy the MED-V workspace either by using an electronic software distribution system or in a Windows 7 image.

segment.source: Or if you prefer, this section also shows you how you can deploy the MED-V workspace manually.
segment.target: Or if you prefer, this section also shows you how you can deploy the MED-V workspace manually.

segment.source: Monitor MED-V Workspaces reviews how to monitor the deployment of MED-V workspaces to determine whether first time setup completed successfully.
segment.target: Monitor MED-V Workspaces reviews how to monitor the deployment of MED-V workspaces to determine whether first time setup completed successfully.

segment.source: Monitoring the success of first time setup is important because MED-V is not in a usable state until first time setup has completed successfully.
segment.target: Monitoring the success of first time setup is important because MED-V is not in a usable state until first time setup has completed successfully.

segment.source: This section also shows you can set up your environment to detect those network changes that can affect MED-V.
segment.target: This section also shows you can set up your environment to detect those network changes that can affect MED-V.

segment.source: Manage MED-V Workspace Applications reviews how to install and remove or publish and unpublish applications on a deployed MED-V workspace.
segment.target: Manage MED-V Workspace Applications reviews how to install and remove or publish and unpublish applications on a deployed MED-V workspace.

segment.source: This section also shows how to manually update software in a MED-V workspace and how to manage automatic updates.
segment.target: This section also shows how to manually update software in a MED-V workspace and how to manage automatic updates.

segment.source: The MED-V workspace is a virtual machine that contains a separate operating system whose automatic software update process must be managed exactly like the physical computers in your enterprise.
segment.target: The MED-V workspace is a virtual machine that contains a separate operating system whose automatic software update process must be managed exactly like the physical computers in your enterprise.

segment.source: Manage MED-V URL Redirection reviews how to add and remove web address redirection settings on the deployed MED-V workspace.
segment.target: Manage MED-V URL Redirection reviews how to add and remove web address redirection settings on the deployed MED-V workspace.

segment.source: You can add or remove URL redirection information through the registry or by rebuilding the MED-V workspace.
segment.target: You can add or remove URL redirection information through the registry or by rebuilding the MED-V workspace.

segment.source: You can also use the wizard on the MED-V Workspace Packager to manage web address redirection.
segment.target: You can also use the wizard on the MED-V Workspace Packager to manage web address redirection.

segment.source: Manage MED-V Workspace Settings reviews how to view and edit MED-V configuration settings by using the MED-V Workspace Packager.
segment.target: Manage MED-V Workspace Settings reviews how to view and edit MED-V configuration settings by using the MED-V Workspace Packager.

segment.source: This section lists all the configurable MED-V registry keys and includes the type, default, and description of each.
segment.target: This section lists all the configurable MED-V registry keys and includes the type, default, and description of each.

segment.source: This section also includes information about how to manage printers in MED-V workspaces.
segment.target: This section also includes information about how to manage printers in MED-V workspaces.

segment.source: In MED-V 2.0, printer redirection gives users a consistent printing experience between the MED-V virtual machine and the host computer.
segment.target: In MED-V 2.0, printer redirection gives users a consistent printing experience between the MED-V virtual machine and the host computer.
